description: It's a roguelike deckbuilder in the style of Luck be a Landlord. Set off on an adventure across islands inhabited by all kinds of monsters and build powerful combos! Discover 6 elements, over 50 monsters, and 100+ cards!

name: Medicus
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Camera Comfort;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Touch Only Option;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing

categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing
description: Run your own medieval store! Stock shelves with groceries and legendary loot, set prices, serve customers, and expand your shop. Fund adventurers to explore dangerous lands and return with valuable chests full of swords, shields, and rare items and all without leaving the counter.

name: Stranded at Sea

description: A short-form empire building strategy game. Explore the planet and grow your colony, while attempting to negotiate with the many characterful rival factions. Make friends, break allegiances, or just drop nukes on them.

description: A 4-player co-op puzzler inspired by real SE-Asia scam compounds. Lured by a fake dream job, you and fellow captives must gather clues, hack locks and dodge patrols to break out — or team up to destroy the operation. Branching endings, side-quests, rescues and in-game anti-fraud tips add tension.

name: The Chronicles of Nesis Demo

description: A tactical turn-based RPG combining aspects from RPG classics. Explore the isolated village of Laria as Elias, an unassuming windmill mechanic, as he is unexpectedly charged with protecting his village from an impending invasion of slime monsters.

name: MARRY THE WITCH
categories: Single-player;Family Sharing
description: You've stumbled upon an invitation letter to MARRY THE WITCH. It's addressed to SATAN, which you are not... but who cares? You've decided to give it a try, and now you found yourself with a crazy girl stuck in some MACHINE. You can't leave, and your only option now is to survive and MARRY her.
